ygData.subject: Re: Obsessive compulsive behavior begins.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine flinched as Ice got him in a Bear hug She was at least five times the strength she was as Shadow Wing. Take it easy on the metal, I don t want to

Lunarpine flinched as Ice got him in a "Bear" hug She was at least 
five times the strength she was as Shadow Wing. "Take it easy on the 
metal, I don't want to end up in the CR chamber over a hug." He 
laughed and put his arms around her. "And don't think you're getting 
out of my promise to protect you just because you're stronger than 
me." 

Foxfingers froze in his tracks for a moment when Ice entered his 
head. The robotic equivelincy to Homer Simpsons "DOH" came out as he 
slapped himself in the forehead. "I'll remember that trick ." He 
thought back as he began down the hall again. He still wasn't sure 
about the extent of her powers but he still wanted his thoughts to be 
kept secret. If Veratis knew that he'd broken into the maximal 
weapons locker then into a Predacon base he wouldn't be a happy 
scientist.

In the lab Veratis tried duplicating the steps that he'd taken but 
for some reason the bot who'd just recieved Dinobots DNA seemed more 
agressive towards accepting it. Veratis figured it was just the 
difference betwee Ice and this bot until he realized that he'd 
forgotten to check the chip. Sure enough He was dealing with a 
Predacon Protoform this time. He tried to delay so he could program 
it but it was to late. The chip had taken effect and the Predacon was 
on his way to being born.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She smiled at FoxFinger. "Pleased to meet you." She couldn't help 
but 
> chuckle quietly at his thoughts.  She send him a message as he ran 
> off. "I'll help you out with that lock anytime you need it."
> 
> She turned, to Lunarpine. She thought to him,"I missed you too. 
Don't 
> be afraid. I made it this far. Besides, I wasn't going to leave 
you. 
> Not after all that you had done for me." She smiled at him and 
walked 
> over.  She hugged him tight in her arms. "I really missed you."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine kept a straight face as Ice sent her message to him. He 
> > looked her in the eyes, "With our reputation in combat I'm sure 
> we'll 
> > be saving each others hides more often.
> > 
> > Foxfingers shook her hand. "It's a pleasure." he said, still in a 
> bit 
> > of a shock from being moved. His thoughts were as quick as his 
> escape 
> > routs as one thought told him "Leave me alone wench" and then "I 
> love 
> > a dominant creature." 
> > 
> > Foxfingers quickly sidestepped her making an excuse as he 
> > did. "Excuse me Ice, I must go um, help Veratis with the DNA." He 
> > scampered off toward the lab thinking "Who's that mutant beast 
> think 
> > she is picking me up like that. Although I'll be sure she's 
around 
> > next time I need a lockpick."
> > 
> > Lunarpine transformed to bot mode and stepped forward. "Good to 
> have 
> > you back." His thoughts told his true feelings "I've missed you, 
I 
> > was afraid for what I'd gotten you into."
